Nick Jonas Made Priyanka Chopra’s Childhood Wish Come True By Proposing With Her Dream Engagement Ring
Nick Jonas Made Priyanka Chopra’s Childhood Wish Come True By Proposing With Her Dream Engagement Ring
Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas make one of the hottest and the most talked about couples of the entertainment industry. Not only that, grapevine cannot get enough of the lovely duo in India, but media abroad is also in awe of the dashing couple that Nick and PC make.
AP and Instagram
Of course, our desi girl Priyanka Chopra is on a roll – professionally as well as personally. Painting the town red, recently, Priyanka Chopra was seen at the launch of 2018 Tiffany Blue Book Collection where she flaunted her huge engagement ring with a glittery smile on her face.
Priyanka Chopra also revealed that the ring was like a dream come. Speaking to People’s Magazine, she revealed that since her childhood she wanted to be proposed with a ring from the brand and Nick made her dream come true.

“Well, I may have dropped that hint. I think we had a conversation about it when we were dating and I’ve always known it had to be Tiffany. Since I was a little girl, it was just something that was stuck in my head and I may have said that and I guess he remembered,” she said.
Nick Jonas had proposed PC on her 36th birthday. Priyanka Chopra is one lucky girl, and we are so happy for her!
